name: The Apartment (itch) (mariotabasco)
description:
The Apartment

The Apartment is a text adventure game based on R. Talsorian Games's tabletop roleplaying game Cyberpunk RED and made with Twine. The story takes place in the world of CDProjekt RED's Cyberpunk 2077. This game is based on the adventure of the same name in the Cyberpunk RED book.
